Q: What payment methods are accepted?
A: We accept PayPal, Credit/Debit Card, AlertPay (Payza), Skrill (MoneyBookers), Liberty Reserve

Q: What is your average setup time?
A: All VPSes are setup instantly so you do not need to wait.

Q: How long have you been in business?
A: Since 2004.

Q: Do you make backups of all VPSs?
A: We do, however, always recommend keeping your own backups in addition to ours in case of hardware problem.

Q: Can you assist transferring our existing data?
A: Sure, we always help customers to transfer their existing data (VPSes with cPanel and Plesk) from another provider without a fee.
